amendment.description: Page 110, after line 8, insert the following new title: ? TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 801. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for a manned space mission to Mars.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds from being used for a manned space mission to Mars.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 274 (Roll no. 339).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Frank (MA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
